channel.title: Config file not working? Setting max fps.
channel.description:
Hi. I got a problem with my pc: it needs a limited amount of frames per second to work with. 300 fps make my pc crash with BSOD. In some other games i solved this by enabling vsync or setting a fps max. The problem is : config file modification did nothing for me and when i try to set max fps ingame it says: cant set fps_max when connected.
I dont want to play with vsync on: it has a negative effect on mouse movement and aim.
How do i set fps max?
